name: faq-questions-minimal
description: Minimal FAQ questions section with simple expandable design.
useCase: Clean and simple FAQ display for minimalist websites.

data.title: Common Questions
data.subtitle: Quick answers to help you get started.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: Sign up, complete your profile, and follow our simple onboarding guide.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal for your convenience.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, cancel anytime from your account settings with no penalties.

questions.question: Is support available?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide email and chat support during business hours.

questions.question: How secure is my data?
questions.answer: All data is encrypted and we're SOC 2 compliant for maximum security.
